entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Periods of rain beginning overnight. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
